about_the_game:
An add-on for ACE COMBAT™ 7: SKIES UNKNOWN.

Contains the following:
- Playable Aircraft: CFA-44 Nosferatu
A next-generation carrier-based stealth fighter optimized for solo raids. Nicknamed “Nosferatu” (meaning undying), its acceleration and mobility far outclass other fighters. Equipped with versatile weaponry, this aircraft is formidable against both air and ground targets.
- Also includes 7 skins, including the special “Strigon” skin, and the new special weapon “ADMM”.

This aircraft can equip the ADMM, EML, or IEWS as its special weapon.
detailed_description:
An add-on for ACE COMBAT™ 7: SKIES UNKNOWN.

Contains the following:
- Playable Aircraft: CFA-44 Nosferatu
A next-generation carrier-based stealth fighter optimized for solo raids. Nicknamed “Nosferatu” (meaning undying), its acceleration and mobility far outclass other fighters. Equipped with versatile weaponry, this aircraft is formidable against both air and ground targets.
- Also includes 7 skins, including the special “Strigon” skin, and the new special weapon “ADMM”.

This aircraft can equip the ADMM, EML, or IEWS as its special weapon.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-7100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750Ti(2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (3GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound card
